question: How many hours of daylight does Uppsala, Sweden receive during the summer solstice?
asked_question_translated: ¿Cuántas horas de luz recibe Uppsala (Suecia) durante el solsticio de verano?
answer: Durante el solsticio de verano, Uppsala (Suecia) recibe aproximadamente 18 horas y 45 minutos de luz solar.
answer_translated_eng: During the summer solstice, Uppsala (Sweden) receives approximately 18 hours and 45 minutes of sunlight.
